title: Terms of Service
introduction: Please read these Terms of Service carefully before using our services. By using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.

agreement.title: Agreement to Terms
agreement.content: By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, then you may not access our services.

services.title: Description of Services
services.content: We provide enterprise-level AI and cloud solutions, including but not limited to AI integration, cloud architecture, security services, and performance optimization.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: The service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of our company and its licensors.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: In no event shall our company be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.

usage.title: Acceptable Use
usage.content: You agree not to use the service for any unlawful purpose or in any way that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair our service.

support.title: Technical Support
support.content: We provide technical support for our services according to the service level agreements specified in your contract.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: For any questions about these Terms, please contact our legal team at:

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using our services, you acknowledge that you have read and understood these Terms of Service and agree to be bound by them.
